name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Michael JOHNSON, a/k/a Norman Gillis, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Michael JOHNSON, a/k/a Norman Gillis, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James D. Famiglio, Broomall, for M. Johnson.
Louis G. Stesis, Dennis C. McAndrews, Media, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
652 A.2d 795
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Michael JOHNSON, a/k/a Norman Gillis, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 7, 1994.
Decided Dec. 30, 1994.
James D. Famiglio, Broomall, for M. Johnson.
Louis G. Stesis, Dennis C. McAndrews, Media, for Com.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
